alert.note: Alert for Buffalo; Hall; Sherman (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 12 at 12:00AM CDT until July 12 at 12:30AM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1230 AM CDT FOR NORTHEASTERN BUFFALO...SOUTHEASTERN SHERMAN AND NORTHWESTERN HALL COUNTIES... At 1159 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was centered just west of Ravenna, or 22 miles north of Kearney, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Golf ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Ravenna, Cairo and Poole. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
